...作来源一护第二部资料其名字“一护“的涵意，为“永远保护某一个东西“的意思[2]。也因为其日文发音和“草莓“以及“15“的音相同，所以剧中经常可以见到利用谐音代表一护的桥段（例如漫画第1话标题“Death and Strawberry“当中的“Strawberry（草莓）“；一护的房间门牌以“15“作为标示；的成员也用“草莓（berry）“来称呼他）[1]。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  berie, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch bes and German Beere

entry.def: Berries are small, round fruit that grow on a bush or a tree. Some berries are edible, for example blackberries and raspberries.

means.word_mean: 1. any of numerous small and pulpy edible fruits; used as desserts or in making jams and jellies and preserves
2. a small fruit having any of various structures, e.g., simple (grape or blueberry) or aggregate (blackberry or raspberry)

example.en: 100 berries a tooth! That's a highway robbery.
